scripts.deploy: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run start
scripts.dev: cd client && npm run dev && cd ../server && npm run start
scripts.init: cd client && npm i && cd ../server && npm i
scripts.reset: cd client && rm -rf node_module package-lock.json && npm i && npm run build && cd ../server && rm -rf node_modules package=lock.json && npm i && npm run start
